text: the governor of ukraine's northern

it's very difficult to pin that down um

conclude from some of that that he

its demand is that it certainly wants

effectively that means brought under

that russia wants crimea which had

recognized as russian and we know that
it does not want ukraine to ever join
nato now on that last point we know that
ukraine might well agree to that but you
know beyond that vladimir putin has
repeatedly cast ukraine nato and the
west as enemies of russia and entities
which are wanting to do russia harm and
so it's very difficult really to
conclude what the end game is here and
how far vladimir putin is prepared to go
